snippet: Joseph and Diane Incognito, married 48 years, have both suffered health problems over the years, but they remain grateful that they have each other.
abstract: Dominican Sisters, an affiliate of Catholic Charities of New York, one of seven agencies supported by the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps pay Joseph Incognito's health insurance.
lead_paragraph: Joseph and Diane Incognito, married 48 years, have both suffered health problems over the years, but they remain grateful that they have each other.

headline.print_headline: There’s No Letting Go of the Girl He Stole
